Cardiff Anime Society brings together anime and manga fans in a range of different ways.

We welcome anyone with an interest in anime or manga, or even just Japan and its culture; you do not need to be an avid fan to join, as we have members with all levels of knowledge about anime. We look forward to seeing you at our events!
We run screenings every Friday of both movies and anime series, with members given the chance to vote on what is screened through our Discord!
Our membership is Â£4.00 for the year!

We host workshops and gaming nights, as well as bigger events such as the MCM trip and seasonal events!

For full details, have a look at our SU page and instagram.
